a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Coal consumption per capita vs. GDP per capita, 2018
Coal consumption per capita is measured in megawatt-hours per person. Gross domestic product (GDP) per capita
is measured in 2011 international-$, which adjusts for inflation and cross-country price differences.
Source: Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy (2023); Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020)
